fr.sysgli.disbotapi.user

Class DiscordUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sysgli.disbotapi.user.DiscordUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class DiscordUser
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Wraps the classic JDA user with metadata.
    Each DiscordUser is Guild-relative.
    Author:
    Jeremy LAMBERT
    See Also:
    DiscordGuild, Serialized Form

      • addPermission

        public void addPermission(java.lang.String permission)

        Adds a permission to the user.

        Permissions are case sensitive!

        Parameters:
        permission -

      • removePermission

        public void removePermission(java.lang.String permission)

        Removes a permission to the user. Does nothing if the user doesn't have the specified permission.

        Permissions are case sensitive!

        Parameters:
        permission -

      • hasPermission

        public boolean hasPermission(java.lang.String permission)

        Check if the user has a permission.

        Permissions are case sensitive!

        Parameters:
        permission -
        Returns:
        boolean hasPermission

      • clearPermissions

        public void clearPermissions()
        Removes all permissions from this user. The user will still be able to use commands that don't need any permission to be ran.

      • getPermissions

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPermissions()
        Returns the List containing all permissions for this user. Read only.
        Returns:
        List permissions

      • getUserData

        public UserData getUserData()
        Returns the UserData object containing all metadata for this user.
        Returns:
        UserData data
        See Also:
        UserData
